titles.title: A bill to extend temporarily the suspension of duty on 1,3-Bis(4-aminophenoxy)benzene (RODA).

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 6/5/2006--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend temporarily the suspension of duty on 1,3-Bis(4-aminophenoxy)benzene (RODA).
